4 blocks of 4

1 1
2 2
3 3
4 4

11 12 13 14 21 22 23 24 31 32 33 34 41 42 43 44

5 1
6 2
7 3
8 4

51 52 53 54 61 62 63 64 71 72 73 74 81 82 83 84

1 5
2 6
3 7
4 8

15 16 17 18 25 26 27 28 35 36 37 38 45 46 47 48

4 * 4 = 16 combos

16 * 4 * 4 = 16 * 16 = 256 pairs

4 blocks of 4 is 16
16 * 16 => 256
